Config.VanillaConfigPage.Name: Vanilla Config
Config.RSVConfigPage.Name: RSV Config
Config.GeneralSettingsTitle.Name: General Settings
Config.ShowQuestGenerationTooltip.Name: Show Quest Generation Tooltip
Config.QuestFirstDay.Name: Quest First Day
Config.QuestFirstDay.Tooltip: When this option is disabled, the game will not generate quests on the first day, as in the vanilla game.
Config.QuestFestival.Name: Quest Festival
Config.QuestFestival.Tooltip: When this option is disabled, if the game is a festival today or tomorrow, the quest will not be generated, as in the vanilla game.
Config.DailyQuestChance.Name: Daily Quest Chance
Config.MaxQuests.Name: Max Quests
Config.ItemDeliveryQuestTitle.Name: Item Delivery Quest
Config.ResourceCollectionQuestTitle.Name: Resource Collection Quest
Config.FishingQuestTitle.Name: Fishing Quest
Config.SlayMonstersQuestTitle.Name: Slay Monsters Quest
Config.LostItemQuestTitle.Name: Lost Item Quest
Config.QuestWeight.Name: Quest Weight
Config.QuestRewardMultiplier.Name: Quest Reward Multiplier
Config.QuestDays.Name: Quest Days
Config.QuestDays.Tooltip: Quest days limit: 0 indicates unlimited duration
Config.OneQuestPerVillager.Name: One Quest Per Villager
Config.ExcludeMaxHeartsNPC.Name: Exclude Max Hearts NPC
Config.ExcludeNPCList.Name: Exclude NPC List
Config.ExcludeNPCList.Tooltip: List of excluded NPCs.Each NPC name is separated by a comma.(e.g."Lewis, Marnie")
Config.ItemDeliveryFriendshipGain.Name: Item Delivery Friendship Gain
Config.RewriteQuestItem.Name: Rewrite Quest Item
Config.RewriteQuestItem.Tooltip: When this option is enabled, quest items will be selected from the gift taste of villagers meeting the config below. When disabled, the items will revert to the original game's settings and remain unaffected by the options below.
Config.ItemGiftTasteRequirement.Name: Item Gift Taste Requirement
Config.AllowArtisanGoods.Name: Allow Artisan Goods
Config.AllowArtisanGoods.Tooltip: Whether or not the item for the item delivery quest can be Artisan Goods
Config.MaxPrice.Name: Max Price
Config.MaxPrice.Tooltip: The maximum price for a quest item.If it is -1, there is no limit.
Config.MoreResourceCollectionQuest.Name: More Resource Collection Quest
Config.MoreSlayMonsterQuests.Name: More Slay Monster Quests
UI.GenerateVanillaQuest.Tooltip: Initiating today's vanilla daily quest generation
UI.VanillaQuestFirstDay.Tooltip: Vanilla daily quest generation disabled: First day of game cycle
UI.VanillaQuestFestival.Tooltip: Vanilla daily quest generation suspended: Festival scheduled today or tomorrow
UI.VanillaDailyQuest.Tooltip: Vanilla daily quest generation disabled for today
Config.EnableRSVQuestBoard.Name: Enable RSV Quest Board
Config.AllowSameQuest.Name: Allow Same Quest
UI.GenerateRSVQuest.Tooltip: Initiating today's RSV daily quest generation
UI.RSVQuestFirstDay.Tooltip: RSV daily quest generation disabled: First day of game cycle
UI.RSVQuestFestival.Tooltip: RSV daily quest generation suspended: Festival scheduled today or tomorrow
UI.RSVDailyQuest.Tooltip: RSV daily quest generation disabled for today
Config.AppearancePage.Name: Appearance
Config.NoteAppearanceTitle.Name: Note Appearance
Config.NoteScale.Name: Note Scale
Config.XOverlapBoundary.Name: X Overlap Boundary
Config.XOverlapBoundary.Tooltip: Horizontal overlap rate of quest notes.If you set it to 1, you can't overlap at all, if you set it to 0.5, you can overlap half, and if you set it to 0, you can overlap completely.
Config.YOverlapBoundary.Name: Y Overlap Boundary
Config.YOverlapBoundary.Tooltip: Vertical overlap rate of quest notes.If you set it to 1, you can't overlap at all, if you set it to 0.5, you can overlap half, and if you set it to 0, you can overlap completely.
Config.RandomColorMin.Name: Random Color Min
Config.RandomColorMax.Name: Random Color Max
Config.PortraitAppearanceTitle.Name: Portrait Appearance
Config.PortraitScale.Name: Portrait Scale
Config.PortraitOffsetX.Name: Portrait Offset X
Config.PortraitOffsetY.Name: Portrait Offset Y
Config.PortraitTintR.Name: Portrait Tint R
Config.PortraitTintG.Name: Portrait Tint G
Config.PortraitTintB.Name: Portrait Tint B
Config.PortraitTintA.Name: Portrait Tint A
